text: Hopea beccariana is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is found in Peninsular Malaysia, Sumatra, Borneo, and Thailand. ==References== beccariana Category:Trees of Peninsular Malaysia Category:Trees of Sumatra Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Trees of Thailand Category:Critically endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hopea beccariana
